thoughts: Tries to figure out all of the sounds around {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Tries to open {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes, but it's all blurry
Holds {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} beak open, begging for food
Chomps on an egg shell, is this food?
Hears r_c and immediately perks up
Hisses at r_c as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/shift/shifts} in the nest
Screams in indignation as r_c sits on {PRONOUN/r_c/object} in the nest
